Error.Message: SQLSTATE[42S22]: Column not found: 1054 Unknown column 'A.UserID' in 'on clause'

Argument.SQL:
SELECT			A.*, 
				CONCAT(A.AppointmentFirstName,'') AS AppointmentLookupCaption,DoctorTime,US.UserSignInName, 
				'' AS _Other
FROM			hms_appointment AS A
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = A.YID*/
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user AS DO ON DO.UserID=A.UserID 
	LEFT JOIN hms_doctor AS DOC ON DOC.DoctorID=A.DoctorID
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user AS US ON US.UserID=DOC.UserID
	
 
WHERE A.AppointmentID = @@IDENTITY

args:
SELECT			A.*, 
				CONCAT(A.AppointmentFirstName,'') AS AppointmentLookupCaption,DoctorTime,US.UserSignInName, 
				'' AS _Other
FROM			hms_appointment AS A
	/*LEFT JOIN		X AS Y ON Y.YID = A.YID*/
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user AS DO ON DO.UserID=A.UserID 
	LEFT JOIN hms_doctor AS DOC ON DOC.DoctorID=A.DoctorID
	LEFT JOIN sphp_user AS US ON US.UserID=DOC.UserID
	
 
WHERE A.AppointmentID = @@IDENTITY
